name: Code Front End Dashboard CRM Agent
shortDescription: A CRM section to manage leads, opportunities, clients, and sales pipeline within the user dashboard.
fullDescription: This agent adds a CRM (Customer Relationship Management) section to the existing dashboard, focusing on the efficient management of leads, client opportunities, and the sales pipeline. It includes features such as lead capture, opportunity tracking, client profile management, and visual representation of the sales funnel. The section is designed to seamlessly integrate with other user dashboard functionalities, providing users with an intuitive interface for monitoring and nurturing customer relationships, as well as tracking business growth.
UseCases: 1. A sales team needing to track and manage potential leads and clients in a streamlined interface. 2. A business looking to organize customer interactions and opportunities within a unified system. 3. A user who needs a clear visual overview of their sales pipeline and customer lifecycle stages.
